Class Triangle

java.lang.Object
  Triangle

public class Triangle
extends java.lang.Object

Triangle.java represents a triangle in the Euclidean space.

01/03/2021

public boolean isContainedInCircle(double x,
                                   double y,
                                   double r)
This method returns true if the triangle is in a given circle.

Parameters:
x - the x value of the point which is the center of the circle
y - the y value of the point which is the center of the circle
r - the radius of the circle
Returns:
- true if the triangle is in a given circle.

isValid

public boolean isValid(Point p1,
                       Point p2,
                       Point p3)
This method checks if 3 points make a valid triangle. A triangle is valid if no sum of any two sides equals the third side (with precision EPSILON)

Parameters:
p1 - the first point
p2 - the second point
p3 - the third point
Returns:
- true if the triangle(p1,p2,p3) is valid

public java.lang.String toString()
This method returns a String representation of thetTriangle. The format of the string should be: {(x1,y1),(x2,y2),(x3,y3)}
